text: János Zsombor Pelikán (born 19 April 1995) is a Hungarian cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . ==Major results== ;2012 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Junior Road Championships : 1st Stage 6 Tour of Pécs ;2013 : National Junior Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial ;2014 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Under–23 Road Championships ;2016 : National Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial : 1st 20px Road race, National Under–23 Road Championships ;2017 : National Road Championships ::1st 20px Time trial ::4th Road race : 1st Grand Prix Südkärnten : 6th Overall Gemenc Grand Prix ;2018 : 3rd Time trial, National Road Championships : 7th Overall Okolo Jižních Čech ;2019 : 1st V4 Special Series Debrecen–Ibrany : 1st Stage 2 Tour de Serbie : 2nd Time trial, National Road Championships : 2nd V4 Special Series Vasarosnameny–Nyiregyhaza ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Budapest Category:European Games competitors for Hungary Category:Cyclists at the 2019 European Games
title: János Pelikán
